name: crab
dialogue: Mmm mmm MMM! Lots of tasty stuff out there today, huh?.
I love finding new and interesting detritus to try.
Huh? Oh, those guys out there aren't that bad. Really, they're pretty cool once you get to know them.
And if they try anything, BAM! Hit 'em with the claws!
Er, well, maybe you could try to slap 'em with your tail or something? I dunno.
